title: Windows 95 "safe to turn off" screen
content:
This is the message that appears when you finish shutting down Windows 95 and have to manually power off the computer. I'd like to know the font used on it. Thanks in advance!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20140829212034im_/http:/typophile.com/files/logos_e_6435.gif)
author: dontbugme
